org.vadere.simulator.models.sfm

Class PotentialFieldObstacleSFM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.simulator.models.sfm.PotentialFieldObstacleSFM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, PotentialFieldObstacle, GradientProvider

    public class PotentialFieldObstacleSFM
extends java.lang.Object
implements GradientProvider, PotentialFieldObstacle
    Provides gradients for obstacles using the formula of the classical SFM (Helbing 1995).

        Parameters:
        t - current time
        targetID - id of the target of the current pedestrian
        x - position where the gradient should be evaluated
        completeGrad - the result vector
